meanings.definition: To seek favor by flattery or servile behavior.
meanings.sent1: He bootlicks his boss to get a promotion.
meanings.sent2: She always bootlicks the teacher to get good grades.
meanings.sent3: The cat bootlicks the owner for extra treats.
meanings.sent4: The politician bootlicks the voters during election season.
meanings.sent5: The student bootlicks the principal to avoid detention.

meanings.definition: A person who seeks favor by flattery or servile behavior.
meanings.sent1: The bootlicks always try to please those in power.
meanings.sent2: She is known as a bootlicks among her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The bootlicks at the office always brings coffee for the boss.
meanings.sent4: He is such a bootlicks, always agreeing with the manager.
meanings.sent5: The bootlicks in the group never stands up for themselves.
